transcript: Sir, they have to take it down your address at the other station. I will transfer. I will explain everything to them that will all be fine I promise. What's your name?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Sir, they have to take down your address at the other station.  I will transfer.  I will explain everything to them.  It will all be fine.  I promise.
